businesses.name: Makeup by In√®z
businesses.business_details: Cruelty-free hair & makeup artist who genuinely cares  about her clients. Together with my clients I'll determine the perfect look for them and their event. I'm known for natural beauty that enhances people's best features and conceals things they aren't happy with. Make people look and feel absolutely beautiful, but still 'like themselves'. I also focus on sustainability, by using minimal disposable items, and if items have to be disposable by using recycled/recyclable disposables.
businesses.product_details: I always used to stock makeup, and sell this to face-to-face clients during appointments (e.g. touch-up lipstick) or 1-on-1 workshops, or clients would send me a message. I decided to make a simple webshop, to make it easier for people to browse the products that I stock and hopefully reach a wider public.  I'm still aiming to deliver the same personal service, where customers can reach out for advice. All the products are cruelty-free, vegan-friendly and Australian-made. All the brands have high awareness on sustainability.
businesses.new_products:
- New webshop: From services to products. Always used to stock these products, but sold them face-to-face or to people just messaging me. Now available online!
- Service: Reach out for personalised product and make-up recommendations
businesses.headline: Cruelty-free hair & makeup artist
